description: A point in a given space defined by 3 coordinates and associated to a diagram object.  The coordinates may be positive or negative as the origin does not have to be in the corner of a diagram.

contents.name: DiagramObject
contents.description: The diagram object with which the points are associated.

contents.name: DiagramObjectGluePoint
contents.description: A diagram object glue point is associated with 2 or more object points that are considered to be 'glued' together.

contents.name: sequenceNumber
contents.description: The sequence position of the point, used for defining the order of points for diagram objects acting as a polyline or polygon with more than one point.

contents.name: xPosition
contents.description: The X coordinate of this point.

contents.name: yPosition
contents.description: The Y coordinate of this point.

contents.name: zPosition
contents.description: The Z coordinate of this point.
